
Changelog
=========

0.1.3 (2017-07-19)
------------------

* Algorithm setting is moved to JWTProfile.

------------------

* Forgotten unit tests are added.

------------------

* A first version able to encode and decode.

0.1.0 (2017-06-20)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
